dmca.title: Equine Artist Complains to Google Images
dmca.body:
I am writing regarding my copyrighted images that are appearing on "google images".

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

I do not have access to the servers upon which my images are being picked-up by google. I have attempted contact with the sites in question. The International Museum of the Horse, at the Kentucky Hone Park has tried to insert what is necessary to remove my images, but without success. I do not know why. But I do want my copyrighted images removed from Google Images ASAP.

A list of the images I have found, and that still remain, follows.

Thank you, 
[private]
[private]@[private].com 
phone xxx-xxx-xxxx

Under [private] or American Saddlebred, or Saddlebred, or Horse Art

This is the image: www.imh.org/imh/crane/images/tbred.jpg

http://imagcs.google.com/imgres?imgurl=www.imh.org/irh/crane/images/tbred.jpg&  imgrefurl=http://www.imh.org/imh/crane/home.html&h=143&w=202&prev=/ 
images%3Fq%3Dpatricia%2Bcrane%26svnum%3DlO%26hl%3Den%26h%3D%26ie%3DUTF8
